course_description: Master the fundamentals of Python programming with hands-on exercises and real-world examples. Perfect for beginners looking to build a strong foundation in coding.
course_overview: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to Python programming, covering essential concepts such as variables, data types, control structures, functions, and file handling. Learners will engage in practical coding exercises, debug simple programs, and build small projects to reinforce their understanding. By the end of the course, students will be able to write clean, executable Python code and be prepared for more advanced programming topics.
target_audience: Beginners with little to no programming experience who want to learn Python for academic, professional, or personal projects.
prerequisites: Familiarity with using a web browser and text editor
learning_outcomes: Define and use core programming constructs in Python
Write and debug simple Python scripts using variables and control flow
Create reusable code through functions and modules
Manipulate strings, lists, and dictionaries effectively
Read from and write to files using Python
Apply problem-solving skills to develop basic software solutions
